segments.text: I notice the water is just pouring over the edge of the sink, and no one seems to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is drying a plate, completely ignoring the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are sneaking cookies, and it’s like she’s in another world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is balancing on that stool, and it’s only a matter of time before he falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her cookie, so innocent.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel bad for them, like no one is looking out for them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is going to cause so much damage, and she doesn’t even notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is just so neglectful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would step in and help.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast between the calm outside and the chaos inside is heartbreaking.
segments.speaker: PAR
